t: Amazon Faces CIPA Violation Allegations in New Wiretapping Case
s: At CIPAWorld, we talk a lot about the use of CIPA against web recording or web analytics companies. Even though historically CIPA was designed to prevent wiretapping over the phone. But, we have a case today that is a good old-fashioned “wiretapping” case. Kinda.
